name: Drop Drop!
description:
Drop Drop! is a relaxing minimalist puzzle game to keep you enjoying for hours with simple blocks. Use your great puzzle skills to reach the highest score!

Drag & drop puzzle pieces to the grid and merge sets of 2 or more pieces of the same color. Clear pieces, leave space for new ones and get a new higher score. Easy to play hard to master!

Drop Drop! promises to challenge your mind and relieve your soul!

Features:
- Minimalist design
- Global Leader-boards
- Gorgeous theme options
- Relaxing music and sounds
- Dark mode
- Easy to play
